name: Yeet the Robots
description:
Use your gun to propel you around and destroy the evil robots.

Controls:

  • R to Respawn
  • WASD to Move
  • Space to Jump, hold to jump higher
  • Left Mouse Button to Shoot
  • Esc to Exit
  • F to toggle Fullscreen
  • F1 to Free Mouse

 - Checkpoint: you'll respawn here (if you die or press R).

 - Bullet Pickup Pad: generates bullet pickups at a regular interval.

 - Bullet Pickup: picking this up will give you +1 ammo.

- Enemy: yeet these guys.

- Enemy Bullet: try to dodge these.

Includes a leaderboard and highscore system, once you've beaten the game once, see if you can beat it faster!

The windows build is recommended for the best experience
